column5: canadian beer is good. 6 of them is like 18 bud light.after drinking 12 i can really sing in the karoeke contest.
I know this has been mentioned before but I can't seem to find it. What is the duty this year on beer? Thanks.
The amount is based on the price you paid for it and have your receipt to prove it.
Can someone give me and approximate? Is it better to claim your liquor or your beer as your one freebie?
It would be approx. $9.25 per case of beer. I don't know about liquor.
A case of beer costing $14 + tax in the US, will be about $25 after you get it into Canada. You will save $15 to $20 over similar Canadian beer.
"similar Canadian beer" LOL Not many American beers are similar to Canadian beers....IMO. Canadian beer is a special treat for me!! Clarkie
After we paid the duty on our beer this year, we only saved about $3 per case! Not worth the effort.
Buy the good Canadian stuff at the boarder and pay the duty. Still alot cheaper than buying it in Canada. We saved about $15 per case on Blue Light.
I paid $18.30 canadian for two cases each valued at $18 US last weekend. Hope this helps.
I paid $18.30 canadian for two cases each valued at $18 US last weekend. Hope this helps.
